attributes.action: We appeal to the British Government to condemn violence against women in India.
attributes.additional_details:
The violent death of another women due to a sex crime has led to some public outrage in India.  As with other, though few and not well supported demonstrations there will be no action taken by the Indian government.
We call on the British government to denounce violence towards women in India and and for the British government to call on  the Indian government to take affirmative towards supporting women who suffer violence.
